description:
A huge man named Ondoriya challenges Sasara Nurude, Rosho Tsutsujimori, and Rei Amayado—Osaka Division`s Dotsuitare Honpo—to a rap battle. An accident during the battle causes Ondoriya to lose his memory. Sasara and Rosho try to help him get it back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There Is Little Success Where There Is Little Laughter.
There Is Little Success Where There Is Little Laughter.
There is little success where there is little laughter.
